name: SnowMelt
description:
You play as a snowman, beset on all sides by vicious, destructive kids! Your only weapon - snowballs. But be careful - the more snowballs you make, the faster you melt! Luckily for you, someone's sliding blocks of ice through the streets; hopefully those can re-freeze you!

  • Left Click - throw snowball
  • Hold Right Mouse - make snowball
  • Pause / Space - pause
  • H - Help - not yet implemented
  • M - Mute - not yet implemented
  • Backspace - restart room - not yet implemented

The game ends if the bar at right hits the bottom
Keep those destructive kids from smashing you to bits!
Pelt ice blocks with snowballs to re-freeze yourself
